description.narrative: FoodSystems2030 seeks to build the foundations for sustainable food systems that deliver improved livelihoods and safe, affordable and nutritious diets for all. FS 2030 creates new ways of doing business while addressing market and institutional incentives, to put food systems on a better path. Transformed, food systems can be the cornerstone of healthy people, a healthy planet and healthy economies, including a one health approach that explicitly recognizes the interlinkage of human health, animal health, and the health of ecosystems.

FoodSystems2030 zielt darauf ab, die Grundlagen für nachhaltige Lebensmittelsysteme zu schaffen, die eine bessere Lebensgrundlage und eine sichere, erschwingliche und nährstoffreiche Ernährung für alle ermöglichen.
